meanings: (큰 의미 없이) well, (화제를 바꿀 때) by the way, anyway, (그렇지만) but, however

phrases.phrase: 지금까지는 좋아. 그런데 다음 몇 달이 좀 걱정돼.
meanings: 기분·걱정 So far, so good. But I'm a little worried about the next few months.
